alert.note: Alert for Lower Yukon Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 02 at 3:41PM AKST until March 04 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Snow, blowing snow, and mixed precipitation possible. Plan on difficult travel with near blizzard conditions. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, with localized amounts up to 9 inches, and ice accumulations of up to one tenth are possible. * WHERE...Lower Yukon Valley. * WHEN...From Thursday evening through Friday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 55 mph will cause near blizzard conditions at times and drifting snow. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow, sleet or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.
